name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot hailing from the WebtrES club. With its classic box and buttons resembling a cute cat, Circuit has earned the admiration of tech enthusiasts and feline lovers alike. It is equipped with cat-shaped arms and legs, allowing it to navigate the digital landscape with precision and grace. The classic screen displays vibrant waveforms, showcasing its abilities as a powerful oscilloscope. Circuit's sleek design and clever functionality make it a beloved member of the WebtrES club.
